0: Under the leadership of the cunning and excentric Siply, the inner struggle of Peregon ended with the victory of the guards over the merchants
9.132375: After getting what they thought they were owned, though, the men lost all the valuable traders, that kept the commerce going… The trade hub lost it’s hopes for the future and withered, as the guards scattered among the Wastes looking for new job offers or becoming lowly caravan guards
